original_title: The Mojo Manifesto: The Life and Times of Mojo Nixon
overview: On a bicycle trip across the country, a young Neill Kirby McMillan Jr. experiences The Mojo Revelation and becomes Mojo Nixon.  After teaming up with the enigmatic Skid Roper, he unexpectedly finds mainstream success during the Golden Age of MTV.
tagline: The music... the myth... the mayhem.
title: The Mojo Manifesto: The Life and Times of Mojo Nixon
